alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 28 at 9:49PM MDT until October 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with the heaviest amounts along the east facing slopes and higher terrain. * WHERE...Northern Sangre De Cristo mountains, the Wet Mountains and Wet Mountain Valley and central and eastern Fremont County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
